tvoutput: HDMI, NTSC/PAL Selectable, Composite (HDMI and Camcorder Breakout cables not included)
systemrequirement: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7 Pentium III 800 MHz above 256 MB RAM; CD ROM; 1GB free HDD space; Available USB port; 16-bit Color Display; Compatible with Mac OSX
digitalzoom: 4X in Still Image mode, 4X in Video modes up to 720P
fileformat: Picture: JPEG; Movie: AVI (H.264); Music: MP3
storagemedia: Dual SD Card Slots for long video recording, One 2GB card included (No internal memory)
otherfeatures: PC Web Cam, Built in Microphone and Speaker, USB mass storage disk
